abstract: New York Times says Alex MacCallum, assistant managing editor currently overseeing audience development, will assume control of its video department.
lead_paragraph: Ms. MacCallum, head of the audience development group, will take control of a department that has been without a full-time leader since July.

headline.main: Times Names Alex MacCallum to Head Video Unit
headline.print_headline: Assistant Managing Editor at The Times Is Named to Lead the Video Department

snippet: Ms. MacCallum, head of the audience development group, will take control of a department that has been without a full-time leader since July.
